title: Get all BRAND-has-image Relationships
user_story:
As an API consumer\
I want to get all IMAGEs that are attached to a BRAND\
So I can see their logo (resp. their different logos over the time)
description:
# **Request**

* method: `GET`
* URL path: `/brands/<brand-id>/has-image`

# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* a JSON array containing the following relationship data for each item:
  * `brand_id`: integer
  * `image_id`: integer
  * `relationship_id`: integer
  * `relationship_name`: string
  * `created_at`: string
  * `updated_at`: string

**Unhappy path**

* when there are no matches then an empty array is returned â†’ status code 200
* 404 when brand does not exist

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business Logic)**

* the relationships are successfully retrieved when provided with valid data
  * status code `200` when brand was found
* the relationship retrieval fails when the provided data was not valid
  * `404` when `brand` was not found
* when there exist no respective relationships then an empty list is returned
  * status code `200`

# **Quality Gates**

* Unit+Integration tests (Jest) are extended
* Behavior tests (Cucumber) are added
* OpenAPI spec is extended & schema is still valid
* Bruno collection is extended
* Performance tests are extended & existing tests are still green

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
